value:
Comrade or friend, it doesn't matter.
Get in my way, and I'll obliterate you.

Is that... Master Grima?! Master Grima
i-is here? ...Oh, no. They look alike,
but that is a different person.

People should be used and discarded
as soon as they're no longer useful.$k$pA proper tactician should know how
to make use of assets—even if those
assets are called friends.

My faith cannot be shaken. No matter
what happens, I will follow Master
Grima to the very end.

Those allied with Naga are here,
so I must be careful. For now, I will
just observe...

Master Grima was in need of aid, so
$Nf is occupied.

Any who get in Master Grima's way
will be destroyed.
Master Grima deserves better.

An error like this, from me of all
people... Unbelievable.

You're sure? When you give someone
like me something like this, you never
can know what might happen.

My name is of no concern. Everything
is for Master Grima.$k$pIf you must call for me, you may
address me as Morgan.

Let me extend a word of warning
to you, $Nu...$k$pI have agreed to help you now that
you've summoned me, but...$k$pIf I decide that you are working
counter Master Grima's interest,
I will kill you without hesitation.$k$pYou think I would overlook a power
capable of extending influence over
other worlds? You are a threat.$k$pThis is your only reminder. Try not
to do anything that forces me to
end your life.
このっ！
迷いません！
うああっ！
You can't win...
Any punishment you see fit.
I am prepared.
By any means!
I will destroy you!
Master Grima, I'm sorry...
hmph
About my mother... No. I must not speak out of turn.
Aah! A sneak attack? You dare?
Naga... That damned dragon has no right meddling with my heart.
My will, my choices. No matter what you do to me, I shall act as I believe.
Master Grima... I remain your servant.
Up until now, my faith was unshakable. I was ready to kill my own friends...
You remind me of the kind and gentle mother I once knew...
Very well.
What is your plan?
Show me.
